channel.title: Help with dodian drops!
channel.description: I added a whole new monster too the auto spawn he's on the 3rd level of the magic guild andwhen i kill him he doesn't drop what i entered i put it in drops.cfg Any ideas?

item.title: Help with dodian drops!
item.dc:creator: @Rmds90 Rmds90
item.description:
@Rmds90 wrote:

You have to add the npc drop into npcdrops.cfg not in drops.cfg because that is item spawns. You see the % of the drop where it says roll so uhm an example could be. Roll 96.1297192711 so that means that the % is 96 then you have the item id… etc. the amt is the amount and percent is how much below you need to get the item dropped. If you dont see any of this then you added it to a wrong npc. USE NPCDROPS.CFG lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help with dodian drops!
item.dc:creator: @Evan1 Evan`
item.description:
@Evan1 wrote:

When i type debug it show em hti but when i kill him no %%

Read full topic

item.title: Help with dodian drops!
item.dc:creator: @Rmds90 Rmds90
item.description:
@Rmds90 wrote:

npcdrop = 86 526 1 100 //Rat drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop.
86= (ID of NPC)
526 = (Item)
1 = (Amount)
100 = (% of Drop)
this is an example of what a drop should be, if it doesn’t work then you must have added it to a different npc, if the % of it is not 100 then you wont be able to see the drop until it reaches that %. If you want to see the amount of % you get each kill enter this command when your playing ::debug. You dont put it in drops.cfg you have to put it in npcdrops. =D

Read full topic
